member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER
member.summary: Represents volume data. This structure is passed to theFSCTL_GET_NTFS_VOLUME_DATA control code.

summary.para: The number of bytes in a cluster on the specified volume. This value is also known as the cluster factor.
The number of bytes in a file record segment.
The number of bytes in a sector on the specified volume.
The number of clusters in a file record segment.
The number of free clusters in the specified volume.
The starting logical cluster number of the master file table mirror.
The starting logical cluster number of the master file table.
The length of the master file table, in bytes.
The ending logical cluster number of the master file table zone.
The starting logical cluster number of the master file table zone.
The number of sectors in the specified volume.
The number of used and free clusters in the specified volume.
The number of reserved clusters in the specified volume.
The serial number of the volume. This is a unique number assigned to the volume media by the operating system.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER
member.summary: Represents volume data. This structure is passed to theFSCTL_GET_NTFS_VOLUME_DATA control code.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.VolumeSerialNumber
member.summary: The serial number of the volume. This is a unique number assigned to the volume media by the operating system.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.NumberSectors
member.summary: The number of sectors in the specified volume.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.TotalClusters
member.summary: The number of used and free clusters in the specified volume.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.FreeClusters
member.summary: The number of free clusters in the specified volume.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.TotalReserved
member.summary: The number of reserved clusters in the specified volume.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.BytesPerSector
member.summary: The number of bytes in a sector on the specified volume.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.BytesPerCluster
member.summary: The number of bytes in a cluster on the specified volume. This value is also known as the cluster factor.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.BytesPerFileRecordSegment
member.summary: The number of bytes in a file record segment.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.ClustersPerFileRecordSegment
member.summary: The number of clusters in a file record segment.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.MftValidDataLength
member.summary: The length of the master file table, in bytes.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.MftStartLcn
member.summary: The starting logical cluster number of the master file table.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.Mft2StartLcn
member.summary: The starting logical cluster number of the master file table mirror.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.MftZoneStart
member.summary: The starting logical cluster number of the master file table zone.

member.name: NTFS_VOLUME_DATA_BUFFER.MftZoneEnd
member.summary: The ending logical cluster number of the master file table zone.
